February Time Trials

time trials

Reviewing my time trials PBs for February 2022.

Sarah Johnson
2022-03-09

Contents

  • Nitro Tracks
  • Retro Tracks
  • Bonus Tracks
  • All Tracks
    • Day of Month
    • Day of Week
    • Time of Day

In February 2022, I began keeping a spreadsheet of every time new personal best I set in Mario Kart time trials.

Nitro Tracks

The nitro tracks include the Mushroom, Flower, Star, and Special Cups. I set 28 PBs in nitro tracks in February.

# A tibble: 15  2
   track                  n
   <chr>              <int>
 1 Mario Circuit          4
 2 Thwomp Ruins           4
 3 Twisted Mansion        4
 4 Mario Kart Stadium     3
 5 Dolphin Shoals         2
 6 Rainbow Road           2
 7 Bone Dry Dunes         1
 8 Bowser's Castle        1
 9 Cloudtop Cruise        1
10 Electrodrome           1
11 Mount Wario            1
12 Sunshine Airport       1
13 Sweet Sweet Canyon     1
14 Toad Harbor            1
15 Water Park             1

Mario Circuit, Thwomp Ruins, and Twisted Mansion tied for the most PBs set of the Nitro tracks. No PB was set for Shy Guy Falls.

Retro Tracks

The retro tracks include Shell, Banana, Leaf, and Lightning Cups. I set 59 PBs in retro tracks in February.

# A tibble: 16  2
   track                   n
   <chr>               <int>
 1 Donut Plains           14
 2 Mario Circuit           6
 3 Dry Dry Desert          5
 4 Music Park              5
 5 Cheep Cheep Beach       4
 6 Royal Raceway           4
 7 Wario Stadium           4
 8 Yoshi Valley            4
 9 DK Jungle               3
10 Piranha Plant Slide     3
11 Moo Moo Meadows         2
12 Grumble Volcano         1
13 Rainbow Road (N64)      1
14 Sherbert Land           1
15 Tick Tock Clock         1
16 Toad's Turnpike         1

Donut Plains saw the most PBs of any track, by far. This was the first month I began taking the underwater shortcuts, so I practiced them extensively.

Bonus Tracks

The bonus tracks include the Egg, Crossing, Triforce, and Bell Cups. I set 39 PBs in Bonus Tracks during February.

# A tibble: 16  2
   track                   n
   <chr>               <int>
 1 Rainbow Road (SNES)     6
 2 Big Blue                5
 3 Yoshi Circuit           4
 4 Cheese Land             3
 5 Excitebike Arena        3
 6 Ice Ice Outpost         3
 7 Ribbon Road             3
 8 Animal Crossing         2
 9 Dragon Driftway         2
10 Hyrule Circuit          2
11 Baby Park               1
12 Mute City               1
13 Neo Bowser City         1
14 Super Bell Subway       1
15 Wario's Gold Mine       1
16 Wild Woods              1

SNES Rainbow Road saw the most PBs, followed by Big Blue.

All Tracks

In total, I set 126 PBs in February across 47 tracks (all except Shy Guy Falls).

Towards the end of the month I focused on getting a PB in every track, using soft drifting, and nailing mushroomless skips.

Day of Month

I set the most PBs on February 3rd (18), followed by the 14th (happy Valentines Day to me lol) and 26th (16 each).

Day of Week

I set the most PBs on Wednesdays, followed by Saturdays. Tuesday and Fridays saw the fewest PBs.

Time of Day

I set the vast majority of my PBs at night, particularly between 1-2 AM. No PBs were set between 11AM and 4PM.
